PropertyDef.name: type
PropertyDef.Property: 特殊周末及法定假日区分

YearMonthDropDown.ClientEvent: var date = new Date(arg.selectedValue ); arg.selectedValue = date.formatDate ("Ym");

DateDropDown.ClientEvent: var date = new Date(arg.selectedValue ); arg.selectedValue = date.formatDate ("Ymd");
var date = new Date(arg.selectedValue ); arg.selectedValue = date.formatDate ("H:m:s");
